metadata.description:
Collects Amazing Spider-Man (1963) #4 & #18-19, Fantastic Four (1961) #61, Incredible Hulk (1962) #138, Marvel Team-Up (1972) #1, Marvel Two-In-One (1974) #86, And Untold Tales Of Spider-Man (1995) #3.

It was no day at the beach when criminal Flint Marko was mutated into one of Marveldom's most versatile villains and began a career of kicking sand in our favorite heroes' faces! Some of the best battles between Sandman, Spider-Man, the Fantastic Four and the Hulk are collected here!
metadata.name: Spider-Man: Saga of the Sandman
